comment._content: I suspect the note is incorrect - the building noted is in fact the old, and now demolished, Waverley Market as the station is to the right.

comment._content: So much nicer than it is today !!

comment._content:
It's not so bad elyziumfields, though the Baloral Hotel (think it would have been the "North British" back then) got a whole lot grander and more crenellated some time shortly after the picture was taken.
